SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service

Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service.ProductService
@Service public class ProductService extends Object
Service class for managing products within the inventory.

This service class provides methods for creating new products, reserving products by updating stock, and retrieving a list of all products. It interacts with the ProductRepository to perform database operations and uses DataMapper to convert between ProductDTO and Product.

  • Field Details

    • productRepository

      @Autowired public ProductRepository productRepository
      Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Product entities.

      This is used to interact with the database for retrieving, saving, and updating product information.

    • dataMapper

      public DataMapper dataMapper
      Utility class for mapping between ProductDTO and Product.

      This is used to convert between data transfer objects and entity objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductService

      public ProductService()

  • Method Details

    • createProduct

      public void createProduct(ProductDTO product)
      Creates a new product and saves it to the database.

      This method converts a ProductDTO to a Product entity using DataMapper and saves the entity to the database using ProductRepository.

      Parameters:
      product - the ProductDTO containing the details of the product to be created

    • productReservation

      public float productReservation(Map<Integer,Integer> list, List<Product> products)
      Reserves products by updating their stock and calculates the total price for the reservation.

      This method iterates over the provided map of product IDs and quantities, checks and updates the stock for each product, and calculates the total price. If any product's stock becomes negative, the method returns 0 indicating a failed reservation. Otherwise, it returns the total price of the reserved products.

      Parameters:
      list - a map of product IDs to quantities to be reserved
      products - complete list of products
      Returns:
      the total price of the reserved products, or 0 if reservation fails due to insufficient stock

    • getAllProducts

      public List<ProductDTO> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products from the database and converts them to a list of ProductDTO.

      This method fetches all Product entities from the database and converts each entity to a ProductDTO using DataMapper. It returns a list of all products in DTO format.

      Returns:
      a list of ProductDTO representing all products

    • getProductsByOrder

      public List<Product> getProductsByOrder(List<Integer> productIds)
      Retrieves products by their IDs from the database.

      This method fetches Product entities from the database based on a list of product IDs.

      Parameters:
      productIds - the list of product IDs to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of Product representing the products associated with the given IDs
